## RTCClient.subscribe() method

订阅远端 Track

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
subscribe(tracks: QNUNIRemoteTrack[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tracks | QNUNIRemoteTrack\[\] | 要订阅的远端 Track |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Remarks

订阅成功后，根据订阅类型会触发 RTCClinetEvent.onAudioSubscribed 或 RTCClinetEvent.onVideoSubscribed
